page.title: 08Touring in Kinross-shire
page.content: Although most tourists pass through this block or by-pass it on the{M90,} the annual{Kinross Agricultural Show } in August offers an interesting day. The ground used for the show is the grass area behind{Kinross House,}the home of Sir David and Lady Montgomery. The setting for the show is one of the most attractive in Britain. The gardens of Kinross House, which contain herbaceous borders, lawns and neatly-trimmed yews, are open to the public in the summer. The house has an open aspect towards Castle Island in {Loch Leven The only part of Loch Leven that can be reached easily in this area is at{Burleigh Sands,}which are near a side road from the{A911 }at the north end of Kinross (s.p. Scotlandwell). The site is an attractive one in trees with a burn running through it.
